name: South Is Down
description:
Change gravity to navigate the puzzles, but be aware, as changing gravity may have some unexpected side effects!

South Is Down contains disorienting effects, so if you get motion sick easily please take care while playing!

South Is Down Credits

All assets, sound fx, voice over, and code were created by Axel Ward for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Music:
George Street Shuffle Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
